articles.author: Anna Matranga
articles.title: Pope Francis calls on Italy to boost birth rates as Europe weathers a "demographic winter" - CBS News
articles.description: Pope Francis called on Italian and other European leaders to solve problems he said were preventing young couples from choosing parenthood.
articles.content: Rome — Pope Francis warned Friday that Europe is mired in a "demographic winter" and encouraged Italians to have more children. The leader of the Catholic Church urged Italian politicians to take con… [+3021 chars]
